resources.string: Enter HTML code, then tap \"OK.\" The code will be turned into styled text.
The text can then be edited or copied.
However, the style might not be retained if you paste it somewhere else. Whether or how it is kept depends on how much the other app allows/supports it.
The source code of this app is available at https://github.com/sls1005/HTMLRealizer, under the MIT license.
